name: TriangleStorm
description:
TriangleStorm is a simple and challenging side-scroller game. When playing this game you will be standing against obstacles, which you can avoid by changing the gravity on your spacebar key.

The main goal in TriangleStorm is to survive. You've only got one health, get hit and you'll have to restart.

Features:

  • 3 Unique characters
  • 5 Challenging stages
  • 5 Achievements
  • An unique movement
  • Relaxing Music
